sentences: Matthew Logan Vasquez is best known as the lead singer/songwriter/guitarist of indie rock group Delta Spirit.
He is also a member of indie supergroup Middle Brother.
He has released three solo albums: Solicitor Returns (2016), Does What He Wants (2017), and Light'n Up (2019).
His current project is Billboard-described indie supergroup Glorietta.
Matt currently lives in Wimberley, Texas when not on tour.
